710916f-a.text:
303-319 West 4th Street, east side, from Bank to 12th Streets. 301, on the N.W. corner of Bank Street, is not completely shown in
the picture.
May 19, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

710915f-a.text:
301 West 4th Street at the N.E. corner of Bank Street.
May 9, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

Stamp: THE NEW YORK PUBLIC LIBRARY
ASTOR, LENOX AND TILDEN FOUNDATIONS
R   L

710920f.text:
4th Street, north from and including Bank Street. Due to the curvature of 4th Street, the east side of the street is not visible above the S.E. corner of 12th Street, the next intersection. In the background an Eighth Avenue street car may be seen. 4th Street crosses Eighth Avenue north of l2th Street.
March 19, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
